name: The Last Eleven
description:
Defend the gate from waves of orcs!

You stand with your back to a large gate. Peasants stand behind it, the horde approaches in front of it, and the 11 are all that stand in the way. A turn based tactics game from secretcat studios, control the unique defenders as they face the endless horde. Will you make the right calls and hold out long enough for your people to flee?

Coding, Art: Bridie Dutton

Sound, Writing,, Silly Voices: Joe Sullivan

How To Play: On their turn players can either move and attack, or move twice on their turn, some characters have special abilities. Be sure to click on the question mark to view a character's bio and learn more about them!
